Maybe the Dawning of the Age of Aquarius is today!

For me, today's big Aquarius push was the first of the two tricks in @yoursunny's post, [Enable IPv4 Access in EUserv IPv6-only VS2-free](https://talk.lowendspirit.com/discussion/comment/51194#Comment_51194). As @yoursunny explained so clearly, all I had to do was change the DNS resolvers to point to a public NAT64 translator service. Then I could enjoy accessing IPv4-only websites via an IPv6-only VPS! Maybe another day soon I will implement @yoursunny's second trick from the linked post, VXLAN, so that my IPv6-only VPS is accessible from IPv4-only machines.

Maybe the Age of Aquarius means that we no longer need to pay the IPv4 tax for our VPSes! Maybe I can deliver cheap but really high performance IPv6-only VPSes which also can access IPv4-only content! 

Sssshhh! Please don't spoil the fun by mentioning the obvious fact that @AnthonySmith and many others have been doing NAT VPSes for a long time! 

**IPv6 only, NAT64 IPv4 enabled, Ryzen Premium $7 Deal!**

**2 x Ryzen 3700X, 2 GB ECC RAM, 25 GB NVME RAID 1, no IPv4, 1 x /128 IPv6, 1 Gbps, $7/month**

Premium Ryzen VPS -- the best performance you can get without spending more than three times as much every month for your own bare metal, dedicated server! 

If you are sitting between oversold and slow on one side and expensive bare metal on the other side, then this best performance, premium Ryzen VPS is perfect for you!

You get access to the [Proxmox VE control panel.](https://proxmox.com/en/) **You can see real time load averages and performance graphs for the host node!** Do you know any other Hosting Provider who has sufficient confidence in his host node performance to let you see the host node load average numbers?
